entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
